metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39211 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: GLPI is a free Asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 9.2 and prior to version 9.5.6, the telemetry endpoint disclosesGLPI and server information. This issue is fixed in version 9.5.6. As aworkaround, remove the file `ajax/telemetry.php`, which is not needed forusual functions of GLPI.

criterions.comment: glpi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
